login.title: Welcome
login.text: Please log in to your account

forgot.title: Forgot password
forgot.text: Enter your registered email address. we’ll send you a code to reset your password

otp.title: Enter OTP
otp.text: We have share a code of your registered email address robertfox@example.com
otp.error: OTP code is incorrect or incomplete

success.title: Password Changed Successfully
success.text: Your password has been successfully changed. You can now log in with your new password.

errors.passwordPattern: Password must be should contain numbers, special characters and uppercase letters.
